summary: This video provides a detailed walkthrough on creating a new Salesforce developer account and installing the Salesforce CPQ package. It covers the necessary steps for account creation, package installation, and key concepts related to product and price book relationships in Salesforce.

keyPoints.text: Creating a new Salesforce developer account
Understanding the relationship between product, price book, and price book entry
Configuring CPQ layouts for user profiles
Checking the installation status of the CPQ package
